articles.author: D P Satish
articles.title: Gotabaya Flees Like A Fugitive; Basil Too Gone? Rest of Rajapaksas in Sri Lanka at People’s Mercy - News18
articles.description: Gotabaya Rajapaksa managed to board a military aircraft and landed in neighbouring Maldives. According to sources in Colombo, his final destination is the United States of America via United Arab Emirates
articles.content: Unbelievable things happen during a crisis. The once all-powerful-executive President of Sri Lanka Nandasena Gotabaya Rajapaksa has fled the island nation, which he ruled and ruined with an iron fist… [+2984 chars]

articles.author: Nick Pearson
articles.title: Jill Biden forced to apologise over 'breakfast tacos' remark - 9News
articles.description: US First Lady Jill Biden has apologised after giving a speech which described Latino Americans as "as unique as breakfast tacos".
